mapper.select: select * from oms_order where now() > date_add(create_time, interval 2 hour) and status = 0

select id, member_id, order_sn, create_time, member_username, total_amount, pay_amount, freight_amount, pay_type, source_type, status, order_type, delivery_company, delivery_sn, auto_confirm_day, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_post_code, receiver_province, receiver_city, receiver_region, receiver_detail_address, note, confirm_status, payment_time, delivery_time, receive_time, comment_time, modify_time from oms_order t1 where member_id = #{memberId} and status != 5 limit #{offset}, #{size}
